notes:
This dataset includes [OpenStreetMap](http://www.openstreetmap.org) extracts for buildings in Nepal.  The data is hosted on the [Nepal OpenStreetMap Extracts](http://nepal.piensa.co/) website managed by [GeoFabrik](http://www.geofabrik.de/) and [GFDRR](http://www.gfdrr.org/).  

The buildings.* files include all building features in the OpenStreetMap database for Nepal:

- buildings.* matches tags: [building=*](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Key:building),

The data is updated every 30 minutes.

## Other OpenStreetMap extracts
### OSM layers / 30 minutes updates  from nepal.piensa.co   
Hosted on the [Nepal OpenStreetMap Extracts](http://nepal.piensa.co/) website.
### Roads
[Nepal OpenStreetMap Extracts, Roads](https://data.hdx.rwlabs.org/dataset/nepal-openstreetmap-extracts-roads) dataset on HDX.
### OpenStreetMap Daily / 30 minutes updates
Various formats including for small devices (GPS, phones, tablets) on  [2015 Nepal Earthquake](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/2015_Nepal_earthquake#Exporting_OpenStreetMap_data)

See the [2015 Nepal Earthquake](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/2015_Nepal_earthquake) OSM wiki page for more information on the [Humanitarian OpenStreetMap Team](http://hotosm.org/) (or HOT) response.
